element.name: Alithimar
element.description:
The alithimar represent the lawful goodness of the upper plane where blessed warriors dwell. Imbued with this righteous zeal, they are often found fighting the forces of chaos in defense of the innocent.

ALITHIMAR TRAITS

Your alithimar character has the following racial traits.

Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

Alignment. Most alithimar have a strong tendency toward lawful alignments, and a leaning toward good alignments.

Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Strict Moral Code. You refuse to act contrary to your values and alignment. You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or possessed.

Gathered to Battle. You have proficiency in light and medium armor and in two martial weapons of your choice.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Celestial and two other languages of your choice.
